content:
Congratulations on your new TV! That's a great price for a 50-inch 4K TV. You'll definitely want to take advantage of its capabilities with some visually stunning games. Here are some recommendations that will showcase your new TV's features:

1. **Horizon Zero Dawn** (PS4): This action-adventure game features a beautiful post-apocalyptic world with lush environments, detailed machines, and a strong narrative. Its 4K resolution and HDR support will make the most of your TV.
2. **The Last of Us Part II** (PS4): This critically acclaimed game is a masterclass in storytelling, character development, and visuals. The game's detailed environments, character models, and cinematic moments will look incredible on your new TV.
3. **God of War** (PS4): Another PS4 exclusive, God of War is a visually stunning game with detailed character models, environments, and combat animations. The game's Norse mythology setting and cinematic moments will be breathtaking on your 4K TV.
4. **Assassin's Creed Odyssey** (PS4, Xbox One, PC): This open-world adventure game features a massive, beautifully rendered ancient Greek world to explore. With its 4K resolution and HDR support, you'll feel like you're right there in ancient Greece.
5. **Red Dead Redemption 2** (PS4, Xbox One): Rockstar's western epic is a visual masterpiece, with detailed character models, environments, and animations. The game's vast open world and cinematic moments will be a treat on your new TV.
6. **Spider-Man** (PS4): This Spider-Man game is a visual stunner, with detailed character models, environments, and web-slinging action. The game's vibrant colors and fast-paced action will make the most of your TV's capabilities.
7. **Control** (PS4, Xbox One, PC): This third-person shooter features a unique art style, with a blend of sci-fi and supernatural elements. The game's detailed environments and cinematic moments will look great on your 4K TV.
8. **Sea of Thieves** (Xbox One, PC): This pirate-themed adventure game features a beautiful, vibrant world to explore, with detailed ship models and ocean environments. The game's colorful art style will pop on your new TV.
9. **Forza Horizon 4** (Xbox One, PC): This racing game features a stunning open world, with detailed car models, environments, and weather effects. The game's 4K resolution and HDR support will make the most of your TV's capabilities.
10. **Resident Evil 2** (PS4, Xbox One, PC): This survival horror game features a creepy, atmospheric setting, with detailed character models, environments, and animations. The game's cinematic moments will be intense on your new TV.

These games will help you take full advantage of your new TV's capabilities. Enjoy gaming on your new 4K TV!
